Venue.title: Crowne Plaza Asheville
Venue.caption: • 34000 square feet of meeting and banquet facilities • 274 well-appointed guest rooms, including 4 suites and 17 King Executive suites • Complimentary parking • Complimentary high-speed wireless internet • Award-winning restaurant • Mulligan’s Bar & Grille, featuring sandwiches, snacks and drink specials • On-site golf, indoor and outdoor tennis, and swimming • Tennis and Golf Pro Shop • Fitness center with brand new state of the art equipment • Concierge and bell services • Pet Friendly rooms are available
